name: Endless Spider Crawler
description:
This filthy spider thinks that  he cant escape the dungeon whose levels are randomly endlessly generated , Make sure to prove him wrong  (or you can't??) .
Controls: Press spacebar to jump
Credits: Only me, and you guys who came to support me with your fascinating feedback for this pre-access spider endless crawler game .

It is supposed to release for android with a good UI than now (u will know why ,after downloading the game) and more levels and themes like beach theme and forest theme and obviously there will be more levels in a theme than now .

No pre made assets were used (except skybox). Note that it is in alpha version and your constructive feedback is always welcomed :)And if u read till here before downloading , you are an awesome person :)

Contact me on discord if u r making an android game , we can help each other and train our skills .Discord -> Alchemist#9227
